name: Stupid Adventure probably
description:
Every copy of this game is cursed. He will come hunt you down.

Collect every coin in order to win the game. it is possible. 

Dev's note; there's a glitch where the coins re-spawn if you go back and forth between rooms, i'm looking into it sorry :/

Disclaimer; all Nintendo characters and music used within this project belong to Nintendo Co., i hold none of the rights OR stand to gain any profit from this game. thank you.
